Detailed Description

Convenience class for implementing an action that creates a new scene item.

This class is provided for developers to easily implement an action that creates a new scene item. Simply subclass DzCreateItemAction, and implement the executeAction() method to create the new item, then add the class to the classes exported by your plug-in with DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_FACTORY().

DzCreateItemAction subclasses are automatically added to the main menu under 'Create' as well as the Create Item Toolbar.

Black Hole Modifier sample shows an example of a new 'Create Item' action that adds a new modifier to the scene.

Default Constructor. To create a new action, you must subclass DzCreateItemAction and provide parameters for the action.

Parameters:
text The menu text for this action.
desc The verbose description for this action.
